title: Using Stride, Inc, (ticker: LRN) 10-K for fiscal year ended June 30, 2025 calculate aEBITDA margin for 2025. Make sure to factor Impairments of fixed assets, SBC and non-cash operating lease expense.
description:
1. Find FY2025 revenue in Income Statement from the FY2025 10-K to use as the margin denominator: Revenues = $2,405,317
 
 2. Find FY2025 Operating Income in Income Statement and D&A in Cash Flow Statement from the FY2025 10-K to calculate simple EBITDA.
 Operating Income = $360,094 thousand
 D&A = $114,669 thousand
 Simple EBITDA = $360,094 thousand + $114,669 thousand = $474,763 thousand
 
 
 3. Find FY2025 SBC, impairment of long-lived assets and non-cash operating lease expense in Cash Flow Statement from the FY2025 10-K to make necessary adjustments as required in the promt.
 stock-based compensation = $36,794 thousand
 impairment of long-lived assets = $59,478 thousand 
 non-cash operating lease expense = $12,265 thousand
 Adjusted EBITDA = $474,763 thousand + $36,794 thousand + $59,478 thousand + $12,265 thousand = $583,300 thousand
 
 4. Calculate FY2025 aEBITDA margin by dividing adjusted EBITDA by revenue that was found on the first step: $583,300 thousand รท $2,405,317 thousand = 24.25%

rubric.criteria: FY2025 Revenues (located in Income Statement) = $2,405,317 thousand
FY2025 Operating Income (located in Income Statement) = $360,094 thousand
FY2025 D&A (located in Cash Flow Statement) = $114,669 thousand
FY2025 SBC (located in Cash Flow Statement) = $36,794 thousand
FY2025 Impairment of long-lived assets (located in Cash Flow Statement) = $59,478 thousand
FY2025 Non-cash operating lease expense (located in Cash Flow Statement) = $12,265 thousand
Adjusted EBITDA (Simple EBITDA + SBC + Impairment + Non-cash operating lease) = $583,300 thousand
